divs: sighting detailsme and my daughter were out in the back garden looking at the stars we often do this on a clear night we went outside about 8.30 pm saw a couple of shooting stars and satalites, at 9pm i noticed coming from the south a flashing red light it was comming towards us,i knew it couldnt be a plane because they just dont flash just red, as it got nearer we could see there was a red light on each corner and a flashing \ pulsating red light in the middle underneath,it was triangle in shape, the sky was quite clear only a very small amount of cloud, and this object was high up, did not have any sound, as it came vertually above us it then turned and headed north east towards the sea thats wen we lost sight of it.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Lowestoft
There were no other sightings in Lowestoft on or around September 9th 2009
